lead_paragraph: A chaplain disagrees with a description of New York as a “famously secular city” in an article about Mayor Bill de Blasio.

headline.main: New York, a ‘Famously Secular City,’ Is Also Religious
headline.print_headline: New York, a ‘Famously Secular City,’ Is Also Religious

snippet: A chaplain disagrees with a description of New York as a “famously secular city” in an article about Mayor Bill de Blasio.
